كرم فخلفها مع غلام له

It was written on such and such a day of such and such a month of the year] one hundred and forty-four
This is a document from] the Jew Jacob and Joseph son of Jacob the Je[w
... so and so] son of Joseph the Jew [went?] and with him there was a mule he owned.
in order that] Karam [might sell it] so he left it with his servant [[...]]
...] and went out, as he told them, and then he sold it for te[n

...] its mother (i.e. the she-ass) [becomes well] he can sell it.
